item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a passionate and experienced video editor with a keen eye for detail? Do you want to collaborate on growing a YouTube channel and constantly strive for improvement? Then we are looking for you!

What We Are Looking For:

Experience: You have proven experience in editing YouTube videos.

Availability: You can deliver a minimum of 7 videos per week, each 15+ minutes long.

Quality: You are always seeking ways to improve your work and analyze video performance to see what works well and what can be improved.

Send us your portfolio and provide your rate per 15+ minute video. We would also like to know if you are willing to create a short sample video to see if we are a good match.

Apply Now!
If you meet the above requirements and are excited to be part of our team, please respond to this job post. We look forward to seeing your response and portfolio!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video and Audio Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and self-sufficient podcast audio and video editor to join our team. Our ideal candidate is someone who can work independently with minimal guidance and has a keen eye for detail.

Native English proficiency is required to understand and comprehend the nuances of our recordings, including what to include and exclude.

Here is our YouTube channel where you can find the podcast: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHdJzcy6XBDlTv9nbh9s3Vw

Responsibilities:

1. Edit podcast episodes for audio and video, ensuring high-quality production.

2. Add graphic overlays and adapt layouts for varying numbers of participants (1-3 people)

3. Ensure seamless integration of intros, outros, and any ads or sponsorships

4. Enhance audio quality by reducing background noise, balancing levels, and improving overall sound

5. Sync audio and video tracks accurately

6. Implement creative visual elements to make the podcast engaging

7. Collaborate with the team to ensure the final product aligns with our vision and brand

8. Deliver final versions in a timely manner for weekly publication

9. Communicate regularly with the team via Slack channel during EST hours (8 AM - 3 PM)

Requirements:

1. Proven experience in podcast editing (audio and video)

2. Native English proficiency to understand and edit nuanced content accurately

3. Proficiency in editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Audacity, or similar)

4. Strong understanding of audio editing techniques and tools
Ability to create and incorporate graphic overlays

5. Experience in handling multi-camera setups and varying participant numbers

6. Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines consistently

7. Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset
Availability to communicate in the Slack channel during EST hours (8 AM - 3 PM)

Application Instructions:

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience and why you're a good fit for this role.

2. Links to previous podcast episodes or video projects you've edited.

3. Your flat rate per 1 edited 30 minute audio and video podcast episode.

4. Your turn around time per 1 edited 30 minute audio and video podcast episode.

If you have a passion for podcasting and are looking for a reliable ongoing project, we'd love to hear from you.

Apply today and join our creative team!




Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Podcast
Skills: Video Editing, Podcast
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant: Social Media, Video Editing, LinkedIn, Newsletter Growth, AI Expertise - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant for Social Media, Video Editing, LinkedIn Outreach, Newsletter Growth, and AI Expertise

Location: Remote
Job Type: Part-Time/Full-Time

Position Overview:
We are looking for a dynamic Virtual Assistant skilled in social media growth, video editing, LinkedIn outreach, newsletter development, and AI technologies such as ChatGPT. This role is crucial for expanding our reach and effectively engaging our audience.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Video Editing:
o Produce and edit high-quality video content for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and YouTube.
o Enhance videos with captions, graphics, and effects.

2. Social Media Management:
o Schedule and post content across social media platforms.
o Engage with our audience through comments and messages.
o Analyze social media performance to optimize content.

3. LinkedIn Growth:
o Implement strategies to grow LinkedIn following and engagement.
o Conduct outreach to potential clients and partners on LinkedIn.
o Manage LinkedIn content, including posts and articles.

4. Newsletter Growth:
o Develop and execute strategies to build and grow our newsletter subscriber base.
o Create engaging newsletter content.

5. AI and ChatGPT:
o Utilize AI tools, including ChatGPT, to enhance content creation and engagement strategies.
o Integrate AI solutions to streamline workflows and improve efficiency.

Qualifications:
• Proven experience in video editing with a strong portfolio.
• In-depth knowledge of social media platforms and best practices.
• Experience with LinkedIn growth strategies.
• Expertise in AI technologies, particularly ChatGPT.
• Excellent communication and organizational skills.
• Ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks.
• Proficiency in video editing software and social media management tools.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with entrepreneurs, startups, or similar fields.
• Understanding of SEO and digital marketing.
• Graphic design skills.
• Working EST hours of 9-5

How to Apply:
If you are a creative and driven professional with a passion for social media, video content, LinkedIn outreach, newsletter growth, and AI technologies, we want to hear from you.



Budget: $1,250
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, LinkedIn, Newsletter, Outreach Strategy, Podcast
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, LinkedIn, Newsletter, Outreach Strategy, Podcast
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reels Editor Needed ASAP - Upwork
item.description:
Reels Editor

Position: Reels Editor
Location: Remote
Type: Freelance/Contract

About Us:
We are a dynamic AI education and consulting company, dedicated to transforming small to mid-sized enterprises with cutting-edge AI solutions. We’re looking for a talented and creative Reels Editor to join our team and help us create engaging, high-quality Instagram Reels that will captivate our audience and drive our follower growth.

Responsibilities:

• Edit and produce short, engaging Instagram Reels from raw video footage.
• Collaborate with our content team to understand the vision and direction for each Reel.
• Incorporate trending music, text overlays, and dynamic visuals to enhance content.
• Ensure quick turnaround times without compromising on quality.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest trends on Instagram to keep our content fresh and relevant.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a video editor, specifically with Instagram Reels or similar short-form content.
• Strong portfolio showcasing creative and high-quality Reels or similar content.
• Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
• Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work quickly.
• Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
• Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.

To Apply:
Please send your resume, a brief cover letter, and a portfolio of your existing content to [your email address]. Applications without a portfolio will not be considered.

We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Photo Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Photo Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Producer for Facebook and Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Hello fellow Upworkers,

for our Photo AI app (retrolens.ai) we are looking for a skilled video production guru for our Facebook and Instagram Ads. These ads need to attract a target audience of 35-60 (and rather female)


Your Role:
- Ideation:
    - Research current trends
    - Propose ad concepts, with focus on "hooks" to attract users to download the app
- Scriptwriting
- Execution
- Video Editing:
    - Add voiceovers & captions to the video ad.

Down the line we will provide you with feedback to further optimize the videos

Attached are a few example ads we created. We are looking for someone who can do a lot better than this!

Please attach or provide links to your portfolio, specifically highlighting ads and content you have created that resembles the videos from above. Applications without a portfolio will not be considered. Please propose your hourly rate and how much time you will need per video.

We need 4-5 Video ads per week.

We’d love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $16.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:15 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, MOV, MP4, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Ad
Skills: Short Video Ad, MOV, MP4, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Ad
Country: Germany
click to apply
